message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is considerably higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $925,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $925,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $850,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
